content:
As an AI language model, I would say that it is highly likely that CNN will continue to explore new ways to use virtual reality technology in their news reporting in the future. 

CNN has been a pioneer in using virtual reality in journalism and has already made significant strides in this area. With positive feedback from audiences and recognition in the industry, they are likely to continue to innovate and push the boundaries to provide immersive experiences for their viewers. 

Moreover, virtual reality technology is evolving rapidly, with new advancements being made all the time. CNN will undoubtedly keep up with these developments and integrate any useful updates into their news reporting. Therefore, we can surely expect CNN to continue exploring new ways of using virtual reality in their news coverage.
